#include <algorithm>
#include <iostream>

#define EPSILON 0.0000001
#define INT_MAX 2000000000
using namespace std;

struct point {

  int x,y;

} P[600];

double gradients[1000000];

int main() {
int t;
  scanf("%d",&t);
  for(int q=0;q<t;++q){
  int n, ans = 1;

  scanf("%d",&n);

  for(int i=0;i<n;++i)

    scanf("%d%d",&P[i].x,&P[i].y);

  for(int i=0;i<n;++i) {

    int gi = 0;

    for(int j=i+1;j<n;++j)

      if(P[i].x == P[j].x) gradients[gi++] = INT_MAX;

      else gradients[gi++] = double(P[i].y-P[j].y)/double(P[i].x-P[j].x);

    sort(gradients,gradients+gi);

    int v;

    for(int j=0;j<gi;++j) {

      if(j && gradients[j] >= gradients[j-1]-EPSILON && gradients[j] <= gradients[j-1]+EPSILON)

        ++v;

      else v = 2;

      ans = max(ans,v);

    }

  }

  printf("%d\n",ans);
  }
}
